cv - command for generating HTML from YAML


    $ cv -h
    
    Usage of cv:
      -cv string
        	CV in yaml format
      -max-projects uint
        	Number of projects to show (default 1000)
      -max-skills uint
        	Number of skills to show (default 1000)
      -template string
        	Output template, one-page or full (default "one-page")
